entries: ✨ New feature: Configure column order and toggle visibility in the task table
💾 New feature: Added support for saving and restoring database backups
🐛 Bug fix: Improved keyboard navigation using up/down arrows, and refined tab order between components
🌍 Bug fix: Added missing localizations for several text elements
🚀 Improved user experience: cell date, highlight divider, description icon, removed flickering
